briefTitle: Pilot Study of Secondary Causes of Osteopenia/Osteoporosis in Adults With Breast and Prostate Cancer
officialTitle: Pilot Study of Secondary Causes of Osteopenia/Osteoporosis in Adults With Breast and Prostate Cancer
conditions: Breast Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Osteopenia, Osteoporosis
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Determine prevalence of secondary causes of bone loss in patients with new diagnosis of osteopenia/o
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria

1. Diagnosis of nonmetastatic breast cancer or diagnosis of nonmetastatic prostate cancer
2. Measurement of bone mineral density by Dual Energy X-ray Absorptiometry (DEXA) within 6 months of enrollment into study.
3. Patients of all ages are eligible but need to qualify for standard DEXA screening
4. Patients of all performance status are eligible
5. Patients are able to give informed consent

Exclusion Criteria

1. Patients previously diagnosed or treated for osteoporosis/osteopenia
2. Stage IV cancer
